reviews.review: Is the emoji movie the worst movie ever? "No" Is the emoji movie the best movie ever made? "Yes!" Honestly I'd give this movie a ?? out of 10, the graphics were breathtaking, the storyline was flawless, and the romance between gene and jailbreak made my cream my pants, honestly the best movie of The decade and possibly our lifetimes, Jesus died soley for this movie, please buy as many tickets to it as you can
garbage knock off of lego movie not even funny

This movie is art and by far the best film of the summer and maybe even off all time. You might hear the critics and not want to see this movie but trust me you do. Those critics have no lifes and they wouldn't even know a good movie if it sent them an emoji. The jokes were spot on and no scene lasted for too long at all, including the Just Dance scene. Fantastic movie 100 emoji out of ten!

From the moment Sony Pictures Animation announced the forthcoming of said "Emoji Movie", I was intrigued. With the release of the first teaser, the second teaser, and the first official trailer, I could not wait for the day that would go down in history as the release date of the pinnacle achievement of major motion picture creation, July 28th, 2017. Now that I have witnessed God in his true form (AKA Gene), I can tell you heaven is a strange place. 

From the moment I sat down in the theatre' to the end of the credits, I was in a constant state of flux. The Emoji Movie made me laugh, cry, laugh, and it really toyed with my emotions. SPOILER WARNING especially that scene where Gene turned back into just a plain "meh." My initial reaction was screaming followed by protecting my head from the flying popcorn that my fellow theatergoers were throwing at me. 

I hope to see many more Emoji Movies in the wake of its inevitable success (A whole trilogy perhaps) and definitely a Hi-5 Solo Film, as well as a Jailbreak origin story. Then maybe a TV series or two, or a Broadway 1-night performance. Hopefully, in 30 years, we get to witness a new generation of emojis enjoy the limelight that is the cinema, as well as see them pay tribute to the current greats.

The Emoji Movie certainly isn't the worst movie of all time, despite what its initial reviews might discern. Those who lack audacity will praise movies such as Annie Hall, The Godfather trilogy, and To Kill a Mockingbird as the greatest of all time, however, I say the Emoji Movie is the best movie of all time!

-Dr. Hasne Montoya
Harvard, Class of 1988

If you take 168 (hours in a week) and divide it by 24 (hours in a day), it equals 21. What does it have to do with this movie? It is irrelevant to anything in the universe. It will not impact your life in any way. This movie is in no way, shape, or form creative or educational. Its like watching pbs for the killer porn. I woud rather walk through a field of legos than watch this. Please save the children of the future and burn this unholy abomination so we may never think of its existence.
THIS IS LEGIT THE BEST MOIE EVER
Not the best and not the worst either. it was funny and did get a but boring at the end but it's not as terrible as people make it out to be.

It Was Way Better Than I Expected ??. I Loved All The Jokes About The Emojis And The Iphone Apps And Games??. Especially The Kitty One In The Youtube Video ??. That Was Hilarious ??. I Liked The Way How They Made It Like Its How The Phone Actually Works From A Little Persons Point Of View ??. That Was Cool ??. The Only Part I Didn't Like Was The Emotional Parts ??. Well All Of It Was Emotional So I Shouldn't Say That ??. It Was The Romantic Parts Where Jailbreak And Gene Would Get Close And Say "Youre Pretty Cool" And Stuff Like That ??. If You've Seen The Movie, Then You'll Know What I Mean ??. OK That Was My Review For The Emoji Movie So Thanks For Looking ??
